creator: Stiftung SchweizMobil
descriptionHtml:
The free SwitzerlandMobility app is the perfect app for anybody who is out and about in Switzerland either in summer or winter:

- maps of Switzerland from swisstopo up to a scale of 1:10,000 (the best)
- 32,000 km signposted non-motorized routes (national, regional and local)
- complete network of signposted hiking trails (60,000 km)
- 500 routes for winter activities
- 25,000 public transportation stops linked to the timetable of the Swiss Federal Railways (planning a tour with public transportation was never easier)
- information on 4,500 points of interest on the way, such as overnight accommodations, bicycle service stations, etc.
positioning system and compass function (you always know where you are)

With SwitzerlandMobility Plus you can additionally
- download and store swisstopo maps to be used in areas without network coverage (no more problems with dead zones)
- download and store tours you designed, including elevation profile, hiking time, distance and altitude (separately and easily)

Please note:

- The app requires network coverage (useable without network coverage with SwitzerlandMobility Plus).
- No tours can be entered with the app.
Constant use of the GPS may considerably reduce the length of battery life.

Requires a screen resolution of min. 480x320 pixels (HVGA) and multitouch. Unfortunately, the Samsung GT-S6102 or GT-S5570, among others, does not fulfill this requirement.
descriptionShort: SwitzerlandMobility is the perfect app for anybody out and about in Switzerland.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
* New summer routes, effective April 2020
* Updated hiking trail network, effective March 2020
* From now on, the Swiss hiking trail network is three-coloured. Yellow = Hiking Trails, Red = Mountain Hiking Trails, Blue = Alpine Hiking Trails
* Updated data from April 2020

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
* updated data version as of August 2020
* detours
* all saved maps at a glance
* all control elements can be hidden or displayed again by tapping the map once
* trails permitted for use in no-hunting zones and wildlife reserves are now shown
* various error corrections

title: SwitzerlandMobility

creator: Stiftung SchweizMobil
descriptionHtml:
The free SwitzerlandMobility app is the perfect app for anybody who is out and about in Switzerland either in summer or winter:

- maps of Switzerland from swisstopo (the best) up to a scale of 1:10,000
- 32,000 km signposted non-motorized routes (national, regional and local)
- complete network of signposted hiking trails (60,000 km)
- 600 routes for winter activities
- 25,000 public transportation stops linked to the timetable of the Swiss Federal Railways (planning a tour with public transportation was never easier)
- information on 4,500 points of interest on the way, such as overnight accommodations, bicycle service stations, etc.
- positioning system and compass function (you always know where you are)
- map orientation (the map turns and moves in viewing direction)


Save maps & tours

On purchasing a SwitzerlandMobility Plus subscription you can additionally:

- use and save swisstopo maps for areas without network coverage (no more problems with dead zones)
- Recording tours (GPS tracking)
- download and store tours you designed, including elevation profile, hiking time, distance and altitudes (separately and easily)


Technical information

- Requires device with Android 6 or later
- The app requires network coverage (useable without network coverage with SwitzerlandMobility Plus)
- Constant use of the GPS may considerably reduce the length of battery life
descriptionShort: SwitzerlandMobility is the perfect app for anybody out and about in Switzerland.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
NOW with GPS tracking for SwitzerlandMobility Plus subscribers: record your tour and add it to your tour list.

- updated data version as of July 2021

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Route numbers on map
- Photos of routes on map with photo location
- Browse through photo gallery of routes, now with photo location on map
- Route details: notes about the season, for wheelchair users (obstacle-free paths), alpine pastures with guard dogs, traffic volume, mountain bike pushing passages, arrival/return, etc.
- Data as of August 2021

- map orientation (the map turns and moves in viewing direction)


On purchasing a SwitzerlandMobility Plus subscription you can additionally:

- use and save swisstopo maps for areas without network coverage (no more problems with dead zones)
- Recording tours (GPS tracking)
- download and store tours you designed, including elevation profile, hiking time, distance and altitudes (separately and easily)


Technical information

- Requires device with Android 6 or later
- The app requires network coverage (useable without network coverage with SwitzerlandMobility Plus)
- Constant use of the GPS may considerably reduce the length of battery life
descriptionShort: SwitzerlandMobility is the perfect app for anybody out and about in Switzerland.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
New winter routes, effective December 2021
Updated data from December 2021

title: SwitzerlandMobility

creator: Stiftung SchweizMobil
descriptionHtml:
The free SwitzerlandMobility app is the perfect app for anybody who is out and about in Switzerland either in summer or winter:

- maps of Switzerland from swisstopo (the best) up to a scale of 1:10,000
- 32,000 km signposted non-motorized routes (national, regional and local)
- complete network of signposted hiking trails (60,000 km)
- 600 routes for winter activities
- 25,000 public transportation stops linked to the timetable of the Swiss Federal Railways (planning a tour with public transportation was never easier)
- information on 4,500 points of interest on the way, such as overnight accommodations, bicycle service stations, etc.
- positioning system and compass function (you always know where you are)
- map orientation (the map turns and moves in viewing direction)


On purchasing a SwitzerlandMobility Plus subscription you can additionally:

- use and save swisstopo maps for areas without network coverage (no more problems with dead zones)
- Recording tours (GPS tracking)
- download and store tours you designed, including elevation profile, hiking time, distance and altitudes (separately and easily)


Technical information

- Requires device with Android 6 or later
- The app requires network coverage (useable without network coverage with SwitzerlandMobility Plus)
- Constant use of the GPS may considerably reduce the length of battery life
descriptionShort: SwitzerlandMobility is the perfect app for anybody out and about in Switzerland.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
New: improved «My Maps»
- Save maps for an area of up to 50x50 km
- Save all maps of your own tour or of a SwitzerlandMobility route at the push of a button
- Update all maps at once
- Saving maps is faster

Updated data from May 2022

On purchasing a SwitzerlandMobility Plus subscription you can additionally:

- use and save swisstopo maps for areas without network coverage (no more problems with dead zones)
- Recording tours (GPS tracking)
- download and store tours you designed, including elevation profile, hiking time, distance and altitudes (separately and easily)


Technical information

- Requires device with Android 6 or later
- The app requires network coverage (useable without network coverage with SwitzerlandMobility Plus)
- Constant use of the GPS may considerably reduce the length of battery life
descriptionShort: SwitzerlandMobility is the perfect app for anybody out and about in Switzerland.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- New winter routes, effective November 2022
- Updated data from November 2022

title: SwitzerlandMobility

creator: Stiftung SchweizMobil
descriptionHtml:
The free SwitzerlandMobility app is the perfect app for anybody who is out and about in Switzerland either in summer or winter:

- maps of Switzerland from swisstopo (the best) up to a scale of 1:10,000
- 32,000 km signposted non-motorized routes (national, regional and local)
- complete network of signposted hiking trails (60,000 km)
- 600 routes for winter activities
- 25,000 public transportation stops linked to the timetable of the Swiss Federal Railways (planning a tour with public transportation was never easier)
- information on 4,500 points of interest on the way, such as overnight accommodations, bicycle service stations, etc.
- positioning system and compass function (you always know where you are)
- map orientation (the map turns and moves in viewing direction)


On purchasing a SwitzerlandMobility Plus subscription you can additionally:

- use and save swisstopo maps for areas without network coverage (no more problems with dead zones)
- Recording tours (GPS tracking)
- download and store tours you designed, including elevation profile, hiking time, distance and altitudes (separately and easily)


Technical information

- Requires device with Android 6 or later
- The app requires network coverage (useable without network coverage with SwitzerlandMobility Plus)
- Constant use of the GPS may considerably reduce the length of battery life
descriptionShort: SwitzerlandMobility is the perfect app for anybody out and about in Switzerland.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- New: daily updated data
- Display of hiking trail network corrected
- Further bug fixes
